name: Slowking
description: The Royal Pokémon. Slowking undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this Pokémon apparently forgets everything it has learned if the Shellder on its head comes off.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon regains hit points equal to its level when it returns to its Pokéball.
